Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local, #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Park/54th
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local, 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted NB via Lake Park, 55th, Woodlawn, 53rd and Lake Park due to street blockage near Lake Park/54th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local and #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted Northbound via Lake Park, 55th, Woodlawn, 53rd and Lake Park due to street blockage near Lake Park/54th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
